title: 我们为什么不尽量去找些英语笔友呢?
answer: Why don't we try to find some English pen friends?

title: 听广播怎么样?
answer: How about listening to the radio?

title: 我很腼腆,我害怕和她交谈。
answer: I am shy and i am afraid to speak to her.

title: 不要停下来去查看每个单词。
answer: Don't stop to check every word.

title: 看电影和听歌曲是学习英语的好办法!
answer: Watching films and listening to songs are great ways to learn English!

title: 我还建议你和你的朋友们谈谈(所看的)电影或(所听的)歌曲。
answer: I also advise you to talk about the films or songs with your friends.

title: 第一个问题是关于(如何)理解英文电影和歌曲的。
answer: The first question is about understanding English films and songs.

title: 别担心。忘记生词是很合乎常情的!
answer: Do not worry. lt is natural to forget new words!

title: 我建议你每天把四五个单词写在纸片上,并把它们放在你的房间里。
answer: I suggest you write four or five words a day on pieces of paper and place them in youl room.
